scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/sdk build && pnpm -C packages/provider-adapter build
scripts.release: pnpm -r build && pnpm -r test && changeset publish
scripts.demo:happy: PACT_TRANSCRIPT_DIR=.pact/transcripts pnpm demo -- --registry ./providers.jsonl --intent weather.data --explain coarse --demo happy
scripts.demo:price-too-high: PACT_TRANSCRIPT_DIR=.pact/transcripts pnpm demo -- --registry ./providers.jsonl --intent weather.data --explain coarse --demo price-too-high
scripts.demo:timeout: PACT_TRANSCRIPT_DIR=.pact/transcripts pnpm demo -- --registry ./providers.jsonl --intent weather.data --explain coarse --demo timeout
scripts.demo:bad-reveal: PACT_TRANSCRIPT_DIR=.pact/transcripts pnpm demo -- --registry ./providers.jsonl --intent weather.data --explain coarse --demo bad-reveal
scripts.demo:streaming: PACT_TRANSCRIPT_DIR=.pact/transcripts pnpm demo -- --registry ./providers.jsonl --intent weather.data --explain coarse --mode streaming
scripts.examples:all: pnpm example:happy && pnpm example:timeout && pnpm example:dispute && pnpm example:reconcile
